item.title: [PI] GHETTO Completionist Cape Emote
item.dc:creator: @ctk62 ctk62
item.description:
@ctk62 wrote:

Well seeing as someone in an earlier post tried to release, I figured I might as well let mopar have it to (Not RL though :D) Proof that its me Butt-Head…

I do NOT give permission to release anywhere else the owner of this is Butt-Heads and ONLY Butt-Heads or if i get my name changed Entium :P I AM ctk62 on mopar and runelocus if I see this anywhere else then I will remove this immediatly and report the releaser as many times as I can over a week.

If you don’t believe me go check the thread by yourself.

Well heres the code enjoy i suppose I no longer use this.

[code]
/*

  • Ctk62 (Mopar) Butt-Head (RuneServer)
    */
    public void compemote(final Client c) {
    EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() {
    int comptime = 13;
    public void execute(EventContainer comp) {
    if (comptime == 13) {
    c.isDoingComp = true;
    c.startAnimation(13190);
    }
    if (comptime == 12) {
    c.npcId2 = 10224;
    c.isNpc = true;
    c.updateRequired = true;
    c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
    c.startAnimation(13157);
    c.playerStandIndex = 13156;
    }
    if (comptime == 11) {
    c.isNpc = true;
    c.updateRequired = true;
    c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
    c.startAnimation(13152);
    c.gfx100(2465);
    c.playerStandIndex = 13156;
    }
    if (comptime == 7) {
    c.updateRequired = true;
    c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
    c.startAnimation(13156);
    c.playerStandIndex = 13156;
    }
    if (comptime == 0) {
    c.isNpc = false;
    c.updateRequired = true;
    c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
    c.playerStandIndex = 0x328;
    c.startAnimation(12567);
    c.isDoingComp = false;
    }
    if (c == null || comptime <= 0) {
    comp.stop();
    return;
    }
    if (comptime >= 0) {
    comptime–;
    }
    }
    }, 600);
    }[/code]
